Michael Jackson night after a 41-point effort in Philadelphia's most lopsided win of the season, Allen Iverson scored an NBA season-high and career-best 54 in a 107-103 victory over the Cleveland Cavaliers. It was like he was playing horse tonight, said 76ers guard Aaron McKie , who had 20 points and nine assists. " Michael Jordan jumper was deadly." urging Mike Pence to run for the presidency is a former deputy counsel to Ronald Reagan and former U.S. Rep. Jim Ryun , R-Kan. Mike Pence said the decision he and his wife will reach will be based on where can we make the most difference for the conservative principles that carried us into public service. It also comes down to where are we needed most. While Mike Pence would be one of numerous Republicans considering presidential campaigns, he would enter a race for governor as the favorite. has emerged showing two protesters confronting former Defense Donald Rumsfeld at the White House Correspondents dinner on Saturday night. After Desiree Fairooz was taken away by security, Medea Benjamin continued to walk alongside Donald Rumsfeld down a staircase.
